title: Mouldable biodegradable polymer

inventors.name: 尼古拉斯·约翰·麦卡弗里

events.title: Application filed by Plantic Technologies Ltd

classifications.description: Starch; Degradation products thereof, e.g. dextrin
Measuring properties of mixture, e.g. temperature or density
Venting, drying means; Degassing means in the extruder apparatus in screw extruders through a degassing opening of a barrel
Bio-degradable, e.g. bioabsorbable, bioresorbable or bioerodible
Filamentary material, i.e. comprised of a single element, e.g. filaments, strands, threads, fibres
Polyvinyl alcohol; Partially hydrolysed homopolymers or copolymers of esters of unsaturated alcohols with saturated carboxylic acids
Homopolymers or copolymers of vinyl acetate
Chitin; Chondroitin sulfate; Hyaluronic acid; Derivatives thereof
Lignocellulosic material, e.g. wood, straw or bagasse

abstract: The invention provides a biodegradable injection moldable polymer composition, the composition comprises: 45% by weight to 85% by weight of starch and/or modified high amylose; 2% by weight ~ 15% by weight of a water-soluble polymer, preferably selected from ethylene-vinyl alcohol copolymers, polyvinyl alcohol and polyvinyl acetate, having a melting point compatible with the molten state of the starch component; and 5% to 45% by weight of one or more polyol plasticizers, the polyol plasticizer has a molecular weight of 50 to 6000, more preferably 50 to 2500, and even more preferably 100 to 400, and is preferably selected from Free Sorbitol, Glycerin, Maltitol, Xylitol, Mannitol, Erythritol, Polyglycerin, Triolein, Tributyl Citrate, Acetyl Triethyl Citrate, Triacetin ester, 2,2,4-trimethyl-1,3-pentanediol diisobutyrate, polyethylene oxide, ethylene glycol, diethylene glycol and polyethylene glycol; more preferably Free group consisting of glycerin, maltitol, sorbitol, erythritol and xylitol. The composition is preferably substantially water soluble.
abstract_original: 本发明提供了一种具有生物降解性的注射成型性聚合物组合物，所述组合物以干重计包含：45重量％～85重量％的淀粉和/或改性的高直链淀粉；2重量％～15重量％的水溶性聚合物，所述水溶性聚合物优选选自具有与所述淀粉组分的熔融状态相容的熔点的乙烯－乙烯醇共聚物、聚乙烯醇和聚乙酸乙烯酯；和5重量％～45重量％的一种以上的多元醇增塑剂，所述多元醇增塑剂具有50～6000、更优选为50～2500，进而更优选为100～400的分子量，并且优选选自由山梨糖醇、甘油、麦芽糖醇、木糖醇、甘露糖醇、赤藓糖醇、聚甘油、三油酸甘油酯、柠檬酸三丁酯、乙酰基三乙基柠檬酸酯、三乙酸甘油酯、2，2，4－三甲基－1，3－戊二醇二异丁酸酯、聚环氧乙烷、乙二醇、二乙二醇和聚乙二醇组成的组；更优选选自由甘油、麦芽糖醇、山梨糖醇、赤藓糖醇和木糖醇组成的组。所述组合物优选为基本能溶于水。
claims:
1.一种具有生物降解性的注射成型性聚合物组合物，所述组合物以干重计包含：1. A biodegradable injection moldable polymer composition, said composition comprising on a dry weight basis:
      
      
         a)45重量％～85重量％的淀粉和/或改性的高直链淀粉，a) 45% by weight to 85% by weight of starch and/or modified high amylose starch,
      
      
         b)2重量％～15重量％的水溶性聚合物，所述水溶性聚合物优选选自具有与所述淀粉组分的熔融状态相容的熔点的乙烯-乙烯醇共聚物、聚乙烯醇和聚乙酸乙烯酯，b) 2% by weight to 15% by weight of a water-soluble polymer, preferably selected from the group consisting of ethylene-vinyl alcohol copolymers, polyvinyl alcohol and polyvinyl alcohol having a melting point compatible with the molten state of the starch component. vinyl acetate,
      
      
         c)5重量％～45重量％的一种以上的多元醇增塑剂，所述多元醇增塑剂具有50～6000、更优选为50～2500、进而更优选为100～400的分子量，并且优选选自由山梨糖醇、甘油、麦芽糖醇、木糖醇、甘露糖醇、赤藓糖醇、聚甘油、三油酸甘油酯、柠檬酸三丁酯、乙酰基三乙基柠檬酸酯、三乙酸甘油酯、2，2，4-三甲基-1，3-戊二醇二异丁酸酯、聚环氧乙烷、乙二醇、二乙二醇和聚乙二醇组成的组；更优选为选自由甘油、麦芽糖醇、山梨糖醇、赤藓糖醇和木糖醇组成的组。c) 5% to 45% by weight of one or more polyol plasticizers having a molecular weight of 50 to 6000, more preferably 50 to 2500, even more preferably 100 to 400, and Preferably selected from the group consisting of sorbitol, glycerin, maltitol, xylitol, mannitol, erythritol, polyglycerol, triolein, tributyl citrate, acetyl triethyl citrate, triethyl citrate, The group consisting of glyceryl acetate, 2,2,4-trimethyl-1,3-pentanediol diisobutyrate, polyethylene oxide, ethylene glycol, diethylene glycol and polyethylene glycol; more Preferably, it is selected from the group consisting of glycerin, maltitol, sorbitol, erythritol and xylitol.

2.如权利要求1所述的组合物，所述组合物包含0.5重量％～60重量％的填料，所述填料经选择以限定包括机械性能和环境性能在内的所需机械性质。2. The composition of claim 1 comprising 0.5% to 60% by weight of filler selected to define desired mechanical properties including mechanical and environmental properties.

3.如权利要求2所述的组合物，其中所述填料选自包括二氧化硅、滑石、壳多糖、硅灰石、玻璃纤维和纳米颗粒在内的无机填料组。3. The composition of claim 2, wherein the filler is selected from the group of inorganic fillers comprising silica, talc, chitin, wollastonite, glass fibers and nanoparticles.

4.如权利要求1至3中任一项所述的组合物，所述组合物还包含以干重计为0.1重量％～5.0重量％的一种以上的C12-22脂肪酸或C12-22脂肪酸盐。4. The composition according to any one of claims 1 to 3, further comprising more than one C 12-22 fatty acid or C 12-22 fatty acid or C 12- 22 fatty acid salts.

5.如权利要求1至4中任一项所述的组合物，所述组合物包含0.2重量％～3.0重量％的具有1～22的亲水亲油平衡(HLB)值的乳化剂。5. The composition according to any one of claims 1 to 4, comprising 0.2% to 3.0% by weight of an emulsifier having a Hydrophile-Lipophile Balance (HLB) value of 1-22.

6.如权利要求1至5中任一项所述的组合物，所述组合物包含4重量％～45重量％的接枝到淀粉主链的或未接枝到淀粉主链的聚酯。6. A composition as claimed in any one of claims 1 to 5 comprising 4% to 45% by weight of polyester grafted to the starch backbone or not grafted to the starch backbone.
7.如权利要求1至6中任一项所述的组合物，其中所述组合物基本能溶于水。7. The composition of any one of claims 1 to 6, wherein the composition is substantially water soluble.
8.如权利要求7所述的组合物，所述组合物进一步包含聚氧乙烯或聚环氧乙烷。8. The composition of claim 7, further comprising polyoxyethylene or polyethylene oxide.

9.一种由树脂组合物形成的注射成型产品，所述树脂组合物以干重计包含：9. An injection molded product formed from a resin composition comprising, by dry weight:
      
      
         a)45重量％～85重量％的淀粉和/或改性的高直链淀粉，a) 45% by weight to 85% by weight of starch and/or modified high amylose starch,
      
      
         b)2重量％～15重量％的水溶性聚合物，所述水溶性聚合物优选选自具有与所述淀粉组分的熔融状态相容的熔点的乙烯-乙烯醇共聚物、聚乙烯醇和聚乙酸乙烯酯，b) 2% by weight to 15% by weight of a water-soluble polymer, preferably selected from the group consisting of ethylene-vinyl alcohol copolymers, polyvinyl alcohol and polyvinyl alcohol having a melting point compatible with the molten state of the starch component. vinyl acetate,
      
      
         c)5重量％～45重量％的一种以上的多元醇增塑剂，所述多元醇增塑剂具有50～6000、更优选为50～2500、进而更优选为100～400的分子量，并且优选选自由山梨糖醇、甘油、麦芽糖醇、木糖醇、甘露糖醇、赤藓糖醇、聚甘油、三油酸甘油酯、柠檬酸三丁酯、乙酰基三乙基柠檬酸酯、三乙酸甘油酯、2，2，4-三甲基-1，3-戊二醇二异丁酸酯、聚环氧乙烷、乙二醇、二乙二醇和聚乙二醇组成的组；更优选为选自由甘油、麦芽糖醇、山梨糖醇、赤藓糖醇和木糖醇组成的组。c) 5% to 45% by weight of one or more polyol plasticizers having a molecular weight of 50 to 6000, more preferably 50 to 2500, even more preferably 100 to 400, and Preferably selected from the group consisting of sorbitol, glycerin, maltitol, xylitol, mannitol, erythritol, polyglycerol, triolein, tributyl citrate, acetyl triethyl citrate, triethyl citrate, The group consisting of glyceryl acetate, 2,2,4-trimethyl-1,3-pentanediol diisobutyrate, polyethylene oxide, ethylene glycol, diethylene glycol and polyethylene glycol; more Preferably, it is selected from the group consisting of glycerin, maltitol, sorbitol, erythritol and xylitol.

10.一种由基本能溶于水的树脂组合物形成的注射成型产品，所述树脂组合物以干重计包含：10. An injection molded product formed from a substantially water-soluble resin composition comprising, by dry weight:
      
      
         a)45重量％～85重量％的淀粉和/或改性的高直链淀粉，a) 45% by weight to 85% by weight of starch and/or modified high amylose starch,
      
      
         b)2重量％～15重量％的水溶性聚合物，所述水溶性聚合物优选选自具有与所述淀粉组分的熔融状态相容的熔点的乙烯-乙烯醇共聚物、聚乙烯醇和聚乙酸乙烯酯，b) 2% by weight to 15% by weight of a water-soluble polymer, preferably selected from the group consisting of ethylene-vinyl alcohol copolymers, polyvinyl alcohol and polyvinyl alcohol having a melting point compatible with the molten state of the starch component. vinyl acetate,
      
      
         c)5重量％～45重量％的一种以上的多元醇增塑剂，所述多元醇增塑剂具有50～6000、更优选为50～2500、进而更优选为100～400的分子量，并且优选选自由山梨糖醇、甘油、麦芽糖醇、木糖醇、甘露糖醇、赤藓糖醇、聚甘油、三油酸甘油酯、柠檬酸三丁酯、乙酰基三乙基柠檬酸酯、三乙酸甘油酯、2，2，4-三甲基-1，3-戊二醇二异丁酸酯、聚环氧乙烷、乙二醇、二乙二醇和聚乙二醇组成的组；更优选为选自由甘油、麦芽糖醇、山梨糖醇、赤藓糖醇和木糖醇组成的组。c) 5% to 45% by weight of one or more polyol plasticizers having a molecular weight of 50 to 6000, more preferably 50 to 2500, even more preferably 100 to 400, and Preferably selected from the group consisting of sorbitol, glycerin, maltitol, xylitol, mannitol, erythritol, polyglycerol, triolein, tributyl citrate, acetyl triethyl citrate, triethyl citrate, The group consisting of glyceryl acetate, 2,2,4-trimethyl-1,3-pentanediol diisobutyrate, polyethylene oxide, ethylene glycol, diethylene glycol and polyethylene glycol; more Preferably, it is selected from the group consisting of glycerin, maltitol, sorbitol, erythritol and xylitol.
11.如权利要求10所述的注射成型产品，所述注射成型产品进一步包含聚氧乙烯或聚环氧乙烷。11. The injection molded product of claim 10, further comprising polyoxyethylene or polyethylene oxide.

12.如权利要求10或11所述的注射成型产品，其中所述注射成型产品的至少一部分涂覆有耐水性涂料。12. The injection molded product according to claim 10 or 11, wherein at least a part of the injection molded product is coated with a water resistant paint.

13.如权利要求12所述的注射成型产品，其中所述耐水性涂料选自包括紫胶、生物降解性聚酯或聚乳酸溶液的组。13. The injection molded product according to claim 12, wherein the water resistant coating is selected from the group comprising shellac, biodegradable polyester or polylactic acid solution.
